With your visionary leadership, the aim is to scale the product offerings globally and continue making a meaningful impact on education.Role: Vice President of Product EngineeringLocation: Mumbai / KolkataExperience: 15+ yearsWhom are we looking for?min 15 to 17 years of extensive experience in software product engineering / development with a significant background into design and architecture. You would be the "Mini CTO" of the products
Excellent experience and understanding of various fullstack technologies, experience in Microsoft technologies would be an added advantage
Strong track record in leading development of complex products, with expertise in Agile-SCRUM methodologies and proficiency in tools like Jira or equivalent.
